description: List of users with page parameters

requests.curl:
curl -g "http://0.0.0.0/v1/users?page=2&per_page=1" -X GET \
	-H "Accept: application/json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
	-H "Lang: en" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOjcwMTh9.EVr0f0ZsGMO9UjMXsNYzUaiIOnS6RdyK8lnEXP9eBP8"
